title: Save Tigers Template
brief: One of my web templates which is designed with the mindset of saving bengal tigers in india. and we sould save tigers because if we dont stand for them they will not survive.

title: GreenVeg.in Template
brief: GreenVeg.in is a 'Live A Green Life' template focusing on saving nature. this template can be used as a boilerplate to organizations which can make a defference.
